question:
You are going on a short course to a training college abroad. It is a college that you have not been to before. Write a letter to the accommodation officer. In your letter,
give details of your course and your arrival/departure date
explain your accommodation needs
ask for information about getting to and from the college
text: My name is Afrin Ali. I am writing to enquire about my stay for 2 months of my training course in Vietnam.

Firstly, I would like to share that I have enrolled in the SA HR course at Oxford University which starts from the 1st October to November 30, 2019. Hence, I am arriving one week before my training, that's on 25th Setember.

Secondly, I would refer to live  in a aying guest house because I could get a chance to meet new eole as I am new to this city. Also, the accomodation should be somewhere central to the town and if ossible to be near the shoing centres or suermarket  to urchase some basic items.

I would be really grateful if you could rovide me the details of the mode of transort which I can use regularly travel to my college?. In articular it could be either sharing any rivate cabs or ublic buses.
I look to forward to hearing your resonse
